name: White Dream
description: A cross between two epic sativa-dominant strains, Blue Dream and White Widow, White Dream is sure to please fans of potent hybridsÂ as it has tested at over 24% THC. The effect is a combination of the energizing and creative cerebral high of the Blue Dream with the intense body buzz of the White Widow.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Uplifted, Happy, Focused, Energetic, Stress, Depression, Pain, Muscle Spasms, Inflammation, Dry Mouth, Dry Eyes
